narrative:
NO NON-COMPLIANT ITEMS WERE IDENTIFIED DURING THIS INSPECTION. 
 
Applicant meets all requirements to be licensed as a C - Exhibitor. The license fee was e-mailed by the applicant to 
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care. Fort Collins, CO. 
 
The following requirements were explained to the applicant: 
*License process and requirements 
*Record-keeping requirements 
*The Program of Veterinary Care (PVC) 
 
The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the owner and manager. 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. No Regulated 
Activities May Be Conducted Until The USDA License Is Issued.

End Section
